basic.description: This course focuses on contemporary German drama in a socio-historical context. Addresses the difficulties authors confront when dramatizing current social trends, as well as the problems of interpreting and staging a play.
basic.subject: GEW
basic.title: Drama

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: GER 2220 or instructor permission. GER 3400, GER 3310, or GER 3500 are recommended.
